attributes.action: Ban the charge for Asthma related medications
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Having two prescriptions a month with two different types of inhalers (preventer & reliever) this costs too much and i am really struggling to pay the fees. I do not qualify to get my prescriptions free and i think this is wrong! Please sign!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
